description: Number of doubly-regular tournaments of order 4n-1.
comments: Equally, number of skew digraphs in switching classes of Hadamard matrices of order 4n.
references: Spence, Edward; Classification of Hadamard matrices of order 24 and 28. Discrete Math. 140 (1995), no. 1-3, 185-243.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Better name suggested by Brendan McKay, Oct 31 2007
